comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Princess Adelgunde of Bavaria (Full German name: Adelgunde Marie Auguste Therese Prinzessin von Bayern) (born 17 October 1870 in Munich, Kingdom of Bavaria; died 4 January 1958 in Sigmaringen, Baden-Württemberg, Germany) was a Princess of Bavaria by birth and Princess of Hohenzollern through her marriage to William, Prince of Hohenzollern The marriage took place on 20 January 1915 in Munich. Her husband is here: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5740524340/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: trialsanderrors: thanks for the information.  We'll update the record with the additional information.

comment._content: 11 years later, after her marriage to Wilhelm/William at the age of 44:
